title: Quick Start Guide: Your First 15 Minutes with Artifically
description: Get up and running with Artifically in 15 minutes. Create your account, build your first automation, and see results.
content: Welcome to Artifically! This guide will walk you through creating your first automation workflow in just 15 minutes...

title: Building Your First Automation: Step-by-Step Tutorial
description: A detailed walkthrough of creating an automation workflow from scratch, with screenshots and best practices.
content: In this tutorial, you'll build a lead routing automation that assigns incoming leads to sales reps based on territory...

title: Inviting Team Members and Managing Permissions
description: Learn how to add team members to your workspace, set role-based permissions, and manage access control.
content: Artifically supports role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure team members have appropriate permissions...

title: Workflow Builder: Complete Guide to the Visual Editor
description: Master the workflow builder interface—nodes, connections, conditional logic, and advanced features.
content: The Workflow Builder is Artifically's visual interface for designing automation workflows...

title: Approval Workflows: Adding Human-in-the-Loop Review
description: Configure approval steps, set reviewers, manage escalations, and track approval history.
content: Not all workflows should be fully automated. Approval nodes allow human reviewers to validate...

title: Salesforce Integration: Setup and Configuration Guide
description: Connect Artifically to Salesforce, sync data, trigger workflows from CRM events, and manage field mappings.
content: Artifically integrates natively with Salesforce, allowing you to automate workflows based on CRM data...

title: Webhooks: Receiving Real-Time Events from External Systems
description: Set up webhook endpoints to trigger workflows from external events, secure webhooks, and handle retries.
content: Webhooks enable real-time communication between Artifically and external systems...

title: Pricing Plans: Which Plan is Right for You?
description: Understand Artifically's pricing tiers, what's included in each plan, and how to choose the right option.
content: Artifically offers flexible pricing based on your automation needs and team size...

title: Troubleshooting: Why Isn't My Workflow Running?
description: Common reasons workflows fail to execute and how to diagnose and fix them quickly.
content: If your workflow isn't running as expected, there are several common causes to check...

title: API Quickstart: Make Your First API Call in 5 Minutes
description: Get started with Artifically's REST API—authentication, making requests, and handling responses.
content: The Artifically API enables programmatic access to all platform features...
